metadata.title: CVE-2016-7169 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in the File_Upload_Upgrader class in wp-admin/includes/class-file-upload-upgrader.php in the upgrade package uploader in WordPress before 4.6.1 allows remote authenticated users to access arbitrary files via a crafted urlholder parameter.

criterions.comment: wordpress package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.6.1+dfsg-1').
